rewardItem.name: Ultra Ball
rewardItem.description: An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.

missions.name: Participate in public battles using a dark type

rewardPokemon.name: Mudkip
rewardPokemon.description: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.

rewardItem.name: Team enhancer
rewardItem.description: Use this item to increase the amount of teams by 1! You can have up to 20 teams.

rewardItem.name: Ground Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.

rewardItem.name: Ghost Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.
